mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.huodong_id as huodongId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.huodong_order_yesno_types as huodongOrderYesnoTypes ,a.huodong_order_yesno_text as huodongOrderYesnoText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,huodong.huodong_name as huodongName ,huodong.huodong_types as huodongTypes ,huodong.huodong_photo as huodongPhoto ,huodong.huodong_date as huodongDate ,huodong.huodong_content as huodongContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_types as yonghuTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_delete as yonghuDelete
FROM huodong_order a left JOIN huodong huodong ON a.huodong_id = huodong.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.huodong_id = #{params.huodongId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.huodong_order_yesno_types = #{params.huodongOrderYesnoTypes}
and a.huodong_order_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.huodongOrderYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.huodong_id IS NOT NULL
and huodong.huodong_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.huodongName},'%')
and huodong.huodong_types = #{params.huodongTypes}
and huodong.huodong_date like CONCAT('%',#{params.huodongDate},'%')
and huodong.huodong_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.huodongContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_types = #{params.yonghuTypes}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
